actions.name: AssociateConnectionAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to associate connection aliases with directories

actions.name: AssociateIpGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to associate IP access control groups with directories

actions.name: AssociateWorkspaceApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a workspace application with a WorkSpace

actions.name: AuthorizeIpRules
actions.description: Grants permission to add rules to IP access control groups

actions.name: CopyWorkspaceImage
actions.description: Grants permission to copy a WorkSpace image

actions.name: CreateConnectClientAddIn
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Connect client add-in within a directory

actions.name: CreateConnectionAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to create connection aliases for use with cross-Region redirection

actions.name: CreateIpGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create IP access control groups

actions.name: CreateStandbyWorkspaces
actions.description: Grants permission to create one or more Standby WorkSpaces

actions.name: CreateTags
actions.description: Grants permission to create tags for WorkSpaces resources

actions.name: CreateUpdatedWorkspaceImage
actions.description: Grants permission to create an updated WorkSpace image

actions.name: CreateWorkspaceBundle
actions.description: Grants permission to create a WorkSpace bundle

actions.name: CreateWorkspaceImage
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new WorkSpace image

actions.name: CreateWorkspaces
actions.description: Grants permission to create one or more WorkSpaces

actions.name: DeleteClientBranding
actions.description: Grants permission to delete AWS WorkSpaces Client branding data within a directory

actions.name: DeleteConnectClientAddIn
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Connect client add-in that is configured within a directory

actions.name: DeleteConnectionAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to delete connection aliases

actions.name: DeleteIpGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete IP access control groups

actions.name: DeleteTags
actions.description: Grants permission to delete tags from WorkSpaces resources

actions.name: DeleteWorkspaceBundle
actions.description: Grants permission to delete WorkSpace bundles

actions.name: DeleteWorkspaceImage
actions.description: Grants permission to delete WorkSpace images

actions.name: DeployWorkspaceApplications
actions.description: Grants permission to deploy all pending workspace applications on a WorkSpace

actions.name: DeregisterWorkspaceDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister directories from use with Amazon WorkSpaces

actions.name: DescribeAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the configuration of Bring Your Own License (BYOL) for WorkSpaces accounts

actions.name: DescribeAccountModifications
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve modifications to the configuration of Bring Your Own License (BYOL) for WorkSpaces accounts

actions.name: DescribeApplicationAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about resources associated with a WorkSpace application

actions.name: DescribeApplications
actions.description: Grants permission to obtain information about WorkSpace applications

actions.name: DescribeBundleAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about resources associated with a WorkSpace bundle

actions.name: DescribeClientBranding
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve AWS WorkSpaces Client branding data within a directory

actions.name: DescribeClientProperties
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about WorkSpaces clients

actions.name: DescribeConnectClientAddIns
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of Amazon Connect client add-ins that have been created

actions.name: DescribeConnectionAliasPermissions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the permissions that the owners of connection aliases have granted to other AWS accounts for connection aliases

actions.name: DescribeConnectionAliases
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes the connection aliases used for cross-Region redirection

actions.name: DescribeImageAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about resources associated with a WorkSpace image

actions.name: DescribeIpGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about IP access control groups

actions.name: DescribeTags
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the tags for WorkSpaces resources

actions.name: DescribeWorkspaceAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about resources associated with a WorkSpace

actions.name: DescribeWorkspaceBundles
actions.description: Grants permission to obtain information about WorkSpace bundles

actions.name: DescribeWorkspaceDirectories
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about directories that are registered with WorkSpaces

actions.name: DescribeWorkspaceImagePermissions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about WorkSpace image permissions

actions.name: DescribeWorkspaceImages
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about WorkSpace images

actions.name: DescribeWorkspaceSnapshots
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about WorkSpace snapshots

actions.name: DescribeWorkspaces
actions.description: Grants permission to obtain information about WorkSpaces

actions.name: DescribeWorkspacesConnectionStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to obtain the connection status of WorkSpaces

actions.name: DisassociateConnectionAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate connection aliases from directories

actions.name: DisassociateIpGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate IP access control groups from directories

actions.name: DisassociateWorkspaceApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a workspace application from a WorkSpace

actions.name: ImportClientBranding
actions.description: Grants permission to import AWS WorkSpaces Client branding data within a directory

actions.name: ImportWorkspaceImage
actions.description: Grants permission to import Bring Your Own License (BYOL) images into Amazon WorkSpaces

actions.name: ListAvailableManagementCidrRanges
actions.description: Grants permission to list the available CIDR ranges for enabling Bring Your Own License (BYOL) for WorkSpaces accounts

actions.name: MigrateWorkspace
actions.description: Grants permission to migrate WorkSpaces

actions.name: ModifyAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the configuration of Bring Your Own License (BYOL) for WorkSpaces accounts

actions.name: ModifyCertificateBasedAuthProperties
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the certificate-based authorization properties of a directory

actions.name: ModifyClientProperties
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the properties of WorkSpaces clients

actions.name: ModifySamlProperties
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the SAML properties of a directory

actions.name: ModifySelfservicePermissions
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the self-service WorkSpace management capabilities for your users

actions.name: ModifyWorkspaceAccessProperties
actions.description: Grants permission to specify which devices and operating systems users can use to access their WorkSpaces

actions.name: ModifyWorkspaceCreationProperties
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the default properties used to create WorkSpaces

actions.name: ModifyWorkspaceProperties
actions.description: Grants permission to modify WorkSpace properties, including the running mode and the AutoStop period

actions.name: ModifyWorkspaceState
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the state of WorkSpaces

actions.name: RebootWorkspaces
actions.description: Grants permission to reboot WorkSpaces

actions.name: RebuildWorkspaces
actions.description: Grants permission to rebuild WorkSpaces

actions.name: RegisterWorkspaceDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to register directories for use with Amazon WorkSpaces

actions.name: RestoreWorkspace
actions.description: Grants permission to restore WorkSpaces

actions.name: RevokeIpRules
actions.description: Grants permission to remove rules from IP access control groups

actions.name: StartWorkspaces
actions.description: Grants permission to start AutoStop WorkSpaces

actions.name: StopWorkspaces
actions.description: Grants permission to stop AutoStop WorkSpaces

actions.name: Stream
actions.description: Grants permission to federated users to sign in by using their existing credentials and stream their workspace

actions.name: TerminateWorkspaces
actions.description: Grants permission to terminate WorkSpaces

actions.name: UpdateConnectClientAddIn
actions.description: Grants permission to update an Amazon Connect client add-in. Use this action to update the name and endpoint URL of an Amazon Connect client add-in

actions.name: UpdateConnectionAliasPermission
actions.description: Grants permission to share or unshare connection aliases with other accounts

actions.name: UpdateRulesOfIpGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to replace rules for IP access control groups

actions.name: UpdateWorkspaceBundle
actions.description: Grants permission to update the WorkSpace images used in WorkSpace bundles

actions.name: UpdateWorkspaceImagePermission
actions.description: Grants permission to share or unshare WorkSpace images with other accounts by specifying whether other accounts have permission to copy the image
